resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75339</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75339</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660e-0fd8-43ec-21e4-38edf045a1b1#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A jogar, 10. század, Parlament, Budapest, fa, aranyozott borítás, kristálygömb.</string>
            <string language="en">The sceptre, 10th century, Parliament, Budapest, wood, gilded case, crystal.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das sceptre, 10. Jahrhundert, Parlament, Budapest,
Holz, vergoldete Fall, Kristall.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le sceptre, le 10ème siècle, le Parlement, 
Budapest, bois, a doré le cas, cristal.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sceptre, 10o século, parliament, Budapest, 
madeira, gilded o caso, cristal.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo sceptre, il decimo secolo, il Parlamento, 
Budapest, legno, gilded il caso, cristallo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το sceptre, 10ος αιώνας, το Κοινοβούλιο, Βουδαπέστη,
ξύλινη, επιχρυσωμένη περίπτωση, κρύσταλλο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sceptre, 10mo siglo, el parlamento, Budapest, 
madera, doró el caso, cristal.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A jogar formája a 10-11. századi burgundi és német ábrázolásokról is ismert, ezért készítését Szent István korára teszik.</string>
            <string language="en">The form of the sceptre is known by the German and Burgundian illustrations from the 10-11th century, therefore its making is postulated around the age of Saint Stephen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">jogar,  Fatimidák,  Szent István,  hegyikristály,  10.század,  </string>
            <string language="en">sceptre, Fatimides, Saint Stephen, mountain crystal, 10th century</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Formular des sceptre bekannt durch die Deutsch- und 
Burgundianabbildungen vom 10-1. Jahrhundert, folglich wird sein Bilden
um das Alter von Heiligem Stephen gefordert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La forme du sceptre est connue par les illustrations 
allemandes et bourguignonnes du 10-11ème siècle, donc sa fabrication 
est postulée autour de l'âge de Saint Stephen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O formulário do sceptre é sabido pelas ilustrações do 
alemão e do Burgundian do 10-11o século, conseqüentemente seu fazer
é postulado em torno da idade de Saint Stephen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La forma dello sceptre è conosciuta tramite le 
illustrazioni di Burgundian e del tedesco dall'10-undicesimo secolo, 
quindi relativo fare è postulato intorno all'età di San Stephen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μορφή του sceptre είναι γνωστή από τις 
γερμανικές και από τη Βουργουνδία απεικονίσεις από το 10-11ο 
αιώνα, επομένως η παραγωγή της τίθεται ως αίτημα γύρω από την 
ηλικία Αγίου stephen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La forma del sceptre es sabida por las ilustraciones del 
alemán y de Burgundian a partir del 10-11o siglo, por lo tanto su 
fabricación se postula alrededor de la edad de Santo Stephen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sceptre, Fatimides, Heiliger Stephen, Gebirgskristall, 10. 
Jahrhundert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sceptre, Fatimides, Saint Stephen, cristal de montagne, 
10ème siècle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sceptre, Fatimides, Saint Stephen, cristal da montanha, 10o 
século</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sceptre, Fatimides, San Stephen, cristallo della montagna, 
decimo secolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">sceptre, Fatimides, Αγιος stephen, κρύσταλλο 
βουνών, 10ος αιώνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sceptre, Fatimides, Santo Stephen, cristal de la montaña, 10mo 
siglo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
